original_text: Before they left, Laban had gone to cut the wool from his sheep. While he was away from the house, Rachel took the idols that Laban worshipped in his house.
korean_text: 그 때에 라반이 양털을 깎으러 갔으므로 라헬은 그의 아버지의 드라빔을 도둑질하고

sentences.original_text: Laban had gone to cut the wool from his sheep
While he was away from the house
that Laban worshipped in his house
